cmsc420.meeshquest.part1
Class City

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.geom.Point2D
      java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double
          cmsc420.meeshquest.part1.City
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class City
extends java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double

The City class used in this project. It includes basic information such as the (x,y) coordinates of the city, the radius, and the color used to mark the city on the map.

See Also:
Serialized Form
